byline.original: By CHRISTINA CAPECCHI and MITCH SMITH
byline.contributor: Christina Capecchi reported from St. Paul, and Mitch Smith from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: The Ramsey County attorney in St. Paul said on Friday that he would not step aside, as Mr. Castile’s family had requested, but would seek help weighing the evidence.

headline.print_headline: Special Prosecutor Joins Inquiry in Minnesota Police Shooting Case
headline.main: Special Prosecutor Joins Philando Castile Shooting Case in Minnesota

snippet: The Ramsey County attorney in St. Paul said on Friday that he would not step aside, as Mr. Castile’s family had requested, but would seek help weighing the evidence....
abstract: Ramsey County, Minn, Atty John J Choi says he will not step aside in case of fatal police shooting of Philando Castile, despite calls from victim's family for special prosecutor; announces he has enlisted help of former Justice Dept official Don Lewis to handle case.
